title: Ep52: South Notts Hussars - Sicily and Home
itunes:title: Ep52: South Notts Hussars - Sicily and Home
itunes:subtitle: In the latest installment of their series following the South Notts Hussars, a WW2 artillery unit, Peter and Gary explore the unit's time in Sicily and their return to Britain in 1943. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan...
description:
In the latest installment of their series following the South Notts Hussars, a WW2 artillery unit, Peter and Gary explore the unit's time in Sicily and their return to Britain in 1943.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Peter Hart's Military History is a Living History production.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
